hero.title: Specialists in Mechanical Equipment Insulation Construction
hero.subtitle: Setting new standards in insulation construction with superior technology and know-how.

greetings.title: CEO Message
greetings.content:
Hello.
We are TAEJIN INS Co., Ltd., a company specializing in insulation construction for export equipment and mechanical facilities.
TAEJIN INS prides itself on top quality based on our three company mottos: Diligence, Sincerity, and Honesty.
The CEO and all employees pursue top quality and ZERO safety accidents with years of domestic and international field know-how, and possess the ability to respond faster than anyone in any situation.
We promise to constantly strive to become a top company with high customer satisfaction that you can always trust. Thank you.

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.business: Metal processing, Mechanical equipment insulation, Insulation material wholesale/retail

items.content: Patent pending (Sealed insulation member for outdoor pipe connections)

products.title: Products
products.desc: Exterior materials for insulation of ultra-high and ultra-low temperature tanks and pipes handled in chemical and pharmaceutical plants as well as general water supply and drainage pipes.
effects: Prevents corrosion and condensation on chemical tanks and pipes.
Prevents heat from internal fluids from radiating or being lost to the outside.
Prevents damage to the insulation material and inflow of foreign matter like rain.

items.name: Pipe Cover
items.usage: Exterior material preventing insulation damage and rain inflow when insulating straight pipes or tank bodies.

items.name: Short Elbow Cover
items.usage: Exterior material for pipe direction change sections (ELBOW).

items.name: Long Elbow Cover
items.usage: Exterior material for pipe direction change sections (ELBOW).

items.name: T Cover
items.usage: Exterior material for pipe branch sections (TEE).

items.name: Flange Cover
items.usage: Exterior material for FLANGE sections connecting pipes or valves.

items.name: Valve Cover
items.usage: Exterior material for VALVE sections controlling fluid flow.

items.name: Pump Cover
items.usage: Exterior material for PUMP sections sucking/discharging fluids.

items.name: Tank Head Cover
items.usage: Exterior material for TANK HEAD sections.
